on the Arizona shootings that killed six people and badly wounded Democratic Rep. Gabrielle Giffords , Colin Powell said he was dismayed by the harsh tenor of political debate that some have said may have contributed to the attack. There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do, he said. "All sorts of nastiness.
